name: Entregar for WooCommerce
author: Entregar

sections.description: With this plugin you can easily integrate your WooCommerce store with Entregar shipping method
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/entregar directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Entregar->Ajustes screen to configure the plugin
sections.changelog:
1.2.01

Corrected the version text in readme.txt and readme.md

1.2

Modified the direction of the URL to get the correct TOKEN in production mode
Added more checks to client_api and client_secret to prevent innecesary remote calls to the api interface
Take off by the moment the form with seller data
Now show to the buyer the price with local tax included (+IVA)

1.1.03

Updated the last versions of WordPress 5.6 and Woocommerce 4.8 where the plugin where tested
Chenge the default Order state in mapping options to add new shipping in Entregar to: ‘Select an option’
Add information line in debug mode

1.0

First release

short_description: With this plugin you can easily integrate your WooCommerce store with Entregar shipping method
